elements.text:
You are invited to a Halloween party with your coworkers and you're only close to a couple of people there. You decide to wear a costume. When you arrive, everyone looks at you. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: Maybe I should have toned it down, but know that this is true to myself.
I may have worn something too crazy, but I like it.
I think this costume is fun.
